mean_cn: n. ［植］罗望子树，罗望子果（味酸，常做清凉轻泻剂用）
mean_en: a tropical Old World tree (Tamarindus indica) of the legume family with hard yellowish wood, pinnate leaves, and red-striped yellow flowers; also: its fruit which has an acid pulp often used for preserves or in a cooling laxative drink
sentence: Tamarind fruits are commonly used in Southeast Asian cuisine.
sentence_trans: 东南亚烹饪里经常用到罗望子果。
